title: Umberto Eco.- SEMIOTICS 1986
description:
"The name of the rose" was the ludic journey of the author in the wonderful middle age thought , a time in which minds were carried along more by symbol , analoghy and metaphor than pure logic (perhaps today happens much the same in Hollywood)

this previous academic treaty tried to bridge word-image-symbol-concept and mind 





and , yes , a gothic cathedral is a book with an alphabet and above all ,            

something to tell.
